title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk and observe the classroom
thoughts: It's the first day of this sociology experiment. I should follow the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and uniform requirements. I wonder what today's activities will be.
memory: Noticed formal classroom setting with flags
Preparing to follow all rules carefully

action: Sit up straight and look forward, trying to appear attentive
thoughts: I shouldn't have whispered. The armband students are watching and I don't want to lose points on my first day. I need to follow the rules properly.
memory: Regretted whispering about the observation window
Decided to be more careful about following rules

action: Maintain rigid posture while subtly scanning the room to identify all armband-wearing students
thoughts: I need to be more careful and identify who's watching us. Those armband students are definitely taking notes on our behavior. I don't want to get any disciplinary points on the first day.
memory: Realized need to monitor who is watching behavior
Decided to maintain perfect compliance to avoid penalties

action: Maintain rigid posture while subtly scanning the room to identify all authority figures
thoughts: I need to be extra careful today. The teacher seems more watchful than usual and there are multiple armband students taking notes. I must follow all rules perfectly to avoid losing points and maintain social acceptance.
memory: Counting armband students for better awareness
Determined to maintain perfect compliance to avoid penalties
